## PolySyncIterable.join() method

Return the result of joining the elements of `this` with the given `glue`<!-- -->, or `','` if no glue is given.

**Signature:**

```typescript
join(glue?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

glue


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The string to use for joining the elements


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

A string concatenating all elements of `this` using the given `glue`

## Remarks

`null` or `undefined` elements are treated as empty strings.
